channel.title: [317][HELP][DELTA]A few different things[317][HELP][DELTA]
channel.description:
1.) How do i add 508 teleporting, Like the timers and GFX's also Emotes and everything to 508 Teleporting.
2.) How do i make players loose items on death (I've searched, Can't find).
3.) How do i remove wilderness levels?
4.) Can someone please give me the; Givemod, Giveadmin, Giveowner, Unabn, UnIPBan, Unmute, UnIpmute Commands for Delta.
5.) Attacking is really low, With all weapons. How can i do it not weapon by weapon but by the server increase hits a little.
6.) When i typed ::master it just gives 200m xp then it keeps the level at for instance 9/99 if the level was 9 before the master.
Thanks,
Rep++ to helpers

item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:

[size=18pt]2:[/size]

	if (deathStage == 2 && attacknpc > 0) {
		youdied();//THIS LINE OF CODE.
                AtkPray = 0;
                StrPrayer = 0;
                DefPray = 0;
                RangePray = 0;
                MagePray = 0;
                PrayHeal = false;
                ProtItem = false;
                ProtMage = false;
                ProtRange = false;
                ProtMelee = false;
                Redemption = false;
                Retribution = false;
                Smite = false;
                Chivalry = false;
                Piety = false;
                isSkulled = false;
                lastSkull = 0;
                headIcon = 0;
                turnpray();
                currentHealth = playerLevel[playerHitpoints];
                deathStage = 0;
                resetAnimation();
                frame1();
                prayOn = false;
                AntiTeleDelay = 0;
                EntangleDelay = 0;
                sM("Oh dear you have died!");
                resetOtherAtk();
                followID = 0;
                followID2 = 0;
        }
public void youdied()
		{
				client killerz = (client) server.playerHandler.players[KillerId];
		if(playerHasItem(6570)){
		keep6570 = true;
		deleteItem(6570, 1);
		}

                if (!isSkulled) {
                keepItemHandle();
		}
                if (ProtItem) {
                applyProtectItemProt();
		}
for(int rr=0; rr<playerItems.length; rr++) {
	try {
		if(playerItems[rr] > 0 && playerItems[rr] < 19999) {
			replaceBarrows();
			server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(this, playerItems[rr]-1, absX, absY, playerItemsN[rr], KillerId);
			deleteItem(playerItems[rr]-1, getItemSlot(playerItems[rr]-1), playerItemsN[rr]);
 			writeLog3(GetLastLogin3(0)+"Death Drop:"+getItemName(playerItems[rr]-1)+" Amt:"+playerItemsN[rr]+" KilledBy:" +killerz.playerName, "Death Drop Logs");
		}
	} catch(Exception e) {  }
}
for(int r=0; r<playerEquipment.length; r++) {
	try {
		int item = playerEquipment[r];
		if((item > 0) && (item < 19999)) {
			remove(item, r);
		}
	} catch(Exception e) { sM("ERROR: Removing Equipment"); }
}

		if(playerHasItem(6570)){
		keep6570 = true;
		deleteItem(6570, 1);
		}

for(int rr=0; rr<playerItems.length; rr++) {
	try {
		if(playerItems[rr] > 0 && playerItems[rr] < 19999) {
			replaceBarrows();
			server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(this, playerItems[rr]-1, absX, absY, playerItemsN[rr], KillerId);
			deleteItem(playerItems[rr]-1, getItemSlot(playerItems[rr]-1), playerItemsN[rr]);
 			writeLog3(GetLastLogin3(0)+"Death Drop:"+getItemName(playerItems[rr]-1)+" Amt:"+playerItemsN[rr]+" KilledBy:" +killerz.playerName, "Death Drop Logs");
		}
	} catch(Exception e) {  }
}
		try {

		} catch(Exception e) {}
			server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(this, 526, absX, absY, 1, KillerId);
		try {
		} catch(Exception e) {}
        if (itemKept1 > 0)
            addItem(itemKept1, 1);
        if (itemKept2 > 0)
            addItem(itemKept2, 1);
        if (itemKept3 > 0)
            addItem(itemKept3, 1);
        if (itemKept4 > 0)
            addItem(itemKept4, 1);
	if (keep6570) {
	    addItem(6570, 1);
	    keep6570 = false;
	}
	
			resetKeepItem();
			setDeathConfig();
			hitDiff = 0;	
			updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
		}
    public void keepItem1()
    {
        int highest = 0;
        for (int i = 0; i < playerItems.length; i++)
        {
            int value = (int)Math.floor(GetItemValue(playerItems[i]-1));
            if(value > highest && playerItems[i]-1 != -1)
            {
                highest = value;
                itemKept1 = playerItems[i]-1;
                itemKept1Slot = i;
                itemSlot1 = true;
            }
        }
        for (int i = 0; i < playerEquipment.length; i++)
        {
            int value = (int)Math.floor(GetItemValue(playerEquipment[i]));
            if(value > highest && playerEquipment[i] != -1)
            {
                highest = value;
                itemKept1 = playerEquipment[i];
                itemKept1Slot = i;
                itemSlot1 = false;
            }
        }
    }

    public void keepItem2() {
        int highest = 0;
        for (int i = 0; i < playerItems.length; i++)
        {
            if (itemKept1Slot != i)
            {
                int value = (int)Math.floor(GetItemValue(playerItems[i]-1));
                if(value > highest && playerItems[i]-1 != -1)
                {
                    highest = value;
                    itemKept2 = playerItems[i]-1;
                    itemKept2Slot = i;
                    itemSlot2 = true;
                }
            }
        }
        for (int i = 0; i < playerEquipment.length; i++)
        {
            if (itemKept1Slot != i)
            {
                int value = (int)Math.floor(GetItemValue(playerEquipment[i]));
                if(value > highest && playerEquipment[i] != -1)
                {
                    highest = value;
                    itemKept2 = playerEquipment[i];
                    itemKept2Slot = i;
                    itemSlot2 = false;
                }
            }
        }
    }

    public void keepItem3()
    {
        int highest = 0;
        for (int i = 0; i < playerItems.length; i++)
        {
            if (itemKept1Slot != i && itemKept2Slot != i)
            {
                int value = (int)Math.floor(GetItemValue(playerItems[i]-1));
                if(value > highest && playerItems[i]-1 != -1)
                {
                    highest = value;
                    itemKept3 = playerItems[i]-1;
                    itemKept3Slot = i;
                    itemSlot3 = true;
                }
            }
        }
        for (int i = 0; i < playerEquipment.length; i++)
        {
            if (itemKept1Slot != i && itemKept2Slot != i)
            {
                int value = (int)Math.floor(GetItemValue(playerEquipment[i]));
                if(value > highest && playerEquipment[i] != -1)
                {
                    highest = value;
                    itemKept3 = playerEquipment[i];
                    itemKept3Slot = i;
                    itemSlot3 = false;
                }
            }
        }
    }

    public void keepItem4()
    {
        int highest = 0;
        for (int i = 0; i < playerItems.length; i++)
        {
            if (itemKept1Slot != i && itemKept2Slot != i && itemKept3Slot != i)
            {
                int value = (int)Math.floor(GetItemValue(playerItems[i]-1));
                if(value > highest && playerItems[i]-1 != -1)
                {
                    highest = value;
                    itemKept4 = playerItems[i]-1;
                    itemKept4Slot = i;
                    itemSlot4 = true;
                }
            }
        }
        for (int i = 0; i < playerEquipment.length; i++)
        {
            if (itemKept1Slot != i && itemKept2Slot != i && itemKept3Slot != i)
            {
                int value = (int)Math.floor(GetItemValue(playerEquipment[i]));
                if(value > highest && playerEquipment[i] != -1)
                {
                    highest = value;
                    itemKept4 = playerEquipment[i];
                    itemKept4Slot = i;
                    itemSlot4 = false;
                }
            }
        }
    }

    public void resetKeepItem()
    {
        itemKept1 = itemKept2 = itemKept3 = itemKept4 = -1;
        itemKept1Slot = itemKept2Slot = itemKept3Slot = itemKept4Slot = -1;
    }
    public void keepItemHandle()
    {
        keepItem1();
        keepItem2();
        keepItem3();
        if (itemKept1 > 0)
        {
            if (itemSlot1)
                deleteItem(itemKept1, itemKept1Slot, 1);
            else if (!itemSlot1)
                deleteequiment(itemKept1, itemKept1Slot);
        }
        if (itemKept2 > 0)
        {
            if (itemSlot2)
                deleteItem(itemKept2, itemKept2Slot, 1);
            else if (!itemSlot2)
                deleteequiment(itemKept2, itemKept2Slot);
        }
        if (itemKept3 > 0)
        {
            if (itemSlot3)
                deleteItem(itemKept3, itemKept3Slot, 1);
            else if (!itemSlot3)
                deleteequiment(itemKept3, itemKept3Slot);
        }
    }

    public void applyProtectItemProt()
    {
if(!isSkulled)
        keepItem4();
        if (itemKept4 > 0)
        {
            if (itemSlot4)
                deleteItem(itemKept4, itemKept4Slot, 1);
            else if (!itemSlot4)
                deleteequiment(itemKept4, itemKept4Slot);
        }
if(isSkulled)
        keepItem1();
        if (itemKept1 > 0)
        {
            if (itemSlot1)
                deleteItem(itemKept1, itemKept1Slot, 1);
            else if (!itemSlot1)
                deleteequiment(itemKept1, itemKept1Slot);
        }
    }

[size=18pt]3:[/size]

		if (isInWilderness(absX, absY, 1))
		{
			if (!hasWildySign)
			{
				hasWildySign = true;
				outStream.createFrame(208);
				outStream.writeWordBigEndian_dup(197);
				sendQuest("", 199);
			}
			int level = ((absY - 3520) / 8) + 1;
			if(isinsafewild()){level = 99;}			
			if (level != wildyLevel)
			{
				if(isinsafewild()){
				sendQuest("@whi@SAFE AREA", 199);}	
				else{
				wildyLevel = level;
				sendQuest("Level: " + wildyLevel, 199);}
			}
		}

change int level to

			int level = 200;

and safewilderness to 200

			if(isinsafewild()){level = 200;}

Then look for

if(isinsafewild())
{
  wildyLevel = 99;
}

That level is changed so dont think its 99. change it to 200
you will see that instance of code 3 seperate times go ahead and change all 3 of them to 200

[size=18pt]4[/size]

			if (command.startsWith("banhelp")) {
				sM("-------------------------------------");
				sM("                      ::ipban = pid");
				sM("                      ::banpid = pid");
				sM("");
				sM("::unban = playerName   ::banip = playerName");
				sM("                       ::banuser = playerName");

			}

Where ever it says isMod()
just change it to playerRights >= 1
or 2 if you want your admins to be able to do it.

			if ((command.startsWith("ipban") && isMod())) {
				try {
					int pid = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(6));
					if (pid < 1) {
						sM("Invalid pid");
						return;
					}
					client BannedPlayer = (client) server.playerHandler.players[pid];
					if (server.playerHandler.isPlayerOn(BannedPlayer.playerName)) {
						String modes = "";
						writeLog(BannedPlayer.playerLastConnect, "ipbans");
						PlayerHandler.kickNick = BannedPlayer.playerName;
						yell(BannedPlayer.playerName+ " has been IP banned from the Server");
					}
				} catch (Exception e) {
					sM("Invalid syntax!  Usage:  ::ban PID, find pid from ::players");
					e.printStackTrace();
				}
			}	
			if ((command.startsWith("banip") && isMod())) {
				try {
					String BannedName2 = (command.substring(6));
					client BannedPlayer = (client) server.playerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(BannedName2)];
				if (server.playerHandler.isPlayerOn(BannedName2)) {
					String modes = "";
					writeLog(BannedPlayer.playerLastConnect, "ipbans");
					PlayerHandler.kickNick = BannedName2;
					yell(BannedName2+ " has been IP banned from the Server");
				} else {
					sM("That player is not online");
				}
				} catch (Exception e) {
					sM("Invalid syntax!  Usage:  ::ban PID, find pid from ::players");
					e.printStackTrace();
				}
			}	
if (command.startsWith("unban") && isMod()) {
	try {
		String name = command.substring(6);
		java.util.List<String> bannedUsers = new java.util.ArrayList<String>();
		BufferedReader input = new BufferedReader(new FileReader("./config/bans.txt"));
		String s;
		String unbanned = null;
		while ((s = input.readLine()) != null) {
			if(!s.equalsIgnoreCase(name)) {
				bannedUsers.add(s);
			} else {
				unbanned = s;
			}
			input.close();
			BufferedWriter output = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("./config/bans.txt"));
			for (String s1 : bannedUsers) {
			output.write(s1);
			output.newLine();
			sM("User "+name+" Successfully unbanned.");
		}
		output.close();
	        if(unbanned != null) {
			return;
		}
	}
       	} catch(Exception e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
      	}
}
if (command.startsWith("mute") && isMod()) {
                try {
                    String otherPName = command.substring(5);
                    int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                    if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                        client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

                        p.muted = true;
yell(" "+playerName+" has Muted "+p.playerName+" ");
            writeLog(p.playerName, "mutes");
            sM("You have muted "+p.playerName+"!");
                    } else {
                       sM("The name doesnt exist.");
                    }
                } catch (Exception e) {
                    sM("Try entering a name you want to mute..");
                }
            }
if (command.startsWith("unmute") && isMod())
    {
        try {
            String name = command.substring(7);
            java.util.List<String> bannedUsers = new java.util.ArrayList<String>();
            BufferedReader input = new BufferedReader(new FileReader("./config/mutes.txt"));
            String s;
            String unbanned = null;
            while ((s = input.readLine()) != null)
            {
                if(!s.equalsIgnoreCase(name))
                    bannedUsers.add(s);
                else
                    unbanned = s;
            }
            input.close();
            BufferedWriter output = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("./config/mutes.txt"));
            for (String s1 : bannedUsers)
            {
                output.write(s1);
                output.newLine();
            }
            output.close();
            if(unbanned != null)
                sM("User "+name+" successfully unmuted.");
            return;
        } catch(Exception e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }
			if ((command.startsWith("banpid") && isMod())) {
				try {
						int pid = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7));
					if (pid < 1) {
						sM("Invalid pid");
						return;
					}
					client bannedUser = (client) server.playerHandler.players[pid];
					if ((bannedUser == null) || (bannedUser.disconnected == true)) {
						sM("Player is not online");
						return;
					}
					String modes = "";
					writeLog(bannedUser.playerName, "bans");
					PlayerHandler.kickNick = bannedUser.playerName;
					yell(bannedUser.playerName+ " has been banned from the Server");
				} catch (Exception e) {

					e.printStackTrace();

			}	
            if (command.startsWith("banuser") && isMod()) {
                try {
                    String otherPName = command.substring(8);
                    int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                    if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                        client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

			writeLog(p.playerName, "bans");
			p.disconnected = true;
			sM("You have banned "+p.playerName+"!");

                       sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                    }
                } catch (Exception e) { 
                    sM("Try entering a name you want to ban..");

[size=18pt]5[/size]
Note this is for Melee

	public void CalculateMaxHit() {
		if ((FightType == 1) || (FightType == 4)) {
			// Accurate & Defensive
			MaxHit += (double) (1.05 + (double) ((double) (StrBonus * Strength) * 0.00175));
		} else if (FightType == 2) {
			// Aggresive
			MaxHit += (double) (1.05 + (double) ((double) (StrBonus * Strength) * 0.00175));
		} else if (FightType == 3) {
			// Controlled
			MaxHit += (double) (1.05 + (double) ((double) (StrBonus * Strength) * 0.00175));
		}
		MaxHit += (double) (Strength * 0.1);

Fix till your heart is content.

[size=18pt]6[/size]

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 3) {
for(int i = 0; i < 21; i++) {
addSkillXP(14000000, i);
}
}

now for you add skillxp boolean

	public boolean addSkillXP(int amount, int skill) {
		if (randomed) {
			sM("You must answer the genie before you can gain experience!");
			return false;
		}
		if ((amount + playerXP[skill]) < 0 || amount + playerXP[skill] > 200000000 || playerXP[skill] >= 200000000) {
			playerXP[skill] = 200000000;
			refreshSkills();
			return false;
		}
		int oldLevel = getLevelForXP(playerXP[skill]);
		// int[] statId = {4004, 4008, 4006, 4016, 4010, 4012, 4014, 4034, 4038,
		// 4026, 4032, 4036, 4024, 4030, 4028, 4020, 4018, 4022, 4152};
		playerXP[skill] += (amount);
		if (oldLevel < getLevelForXP(playerXP[skill])) {
			// if(oldLevel >= 85)
			specGFX(199);
			//checkPlayerCapes.achievedMax(skill, this);

			playerLevel[skill] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[skill]);
			// stillgfx(623, absY, absX);
			// levelup(skill);
			updateRequired = true;
			appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
			if (skill <= 22) {
			sM("Congratulations, you just advanced a "
					+ statName[skill] + " level.");
			getTotalLevel();
			}
			if (playerLevel[skill] > 90)
			// sendFrame126(playerName + " (" + combatLevel + ")", 6572);
			setSkillLevel(skill, playerLevel[skill], playerXP[skill]);
		}
			refreshSkills();
		setSkillLevel(skill, playerLevel[skill], playerXP[skill]);
		if (skill == 2) {
			CalculateMaxHit();
		}
		return true;

	}

Read full topic

item.title: [317][HELP][DELTA]A few different things[317][HELP][DELTA]

item.description:
@SacredHeart wrote:

1.) How do i add 508 teleporting, Like the timers and GFX’s also Emotes and everything to 508 Teleporting.

2.) How do i make players loose items on death (I’ve searched, Can’t find).

3.) How do i remove wilderness levels?

4.) Can someone please give me the; Givemod, Giveadmin, Giveowner, Unabn, UnIPBan, Unmute, UnIpmute Commands for Delta.

5.) Attacking is really low, With all weapons. How can i do it not weapon by weapon but by the server increase hits a little.

6.) When i typed ::master it just gives 200m xp then it keeps the level at for instance 9/99 if the level was 9 before the master.

Thanks,

Rep++ to helpers
